I cannot replicate this defect.  The only useful information I can give is that
I was trying to run a Java appplication from the only project that I had open in
the workspace.  Let me know if you want me to send you any logs that can be of
help. Sorry.

The same thing happens for me on Solaris 8 x86.  (Also Eclipse 3.1)
It doesn't freeze the IDE for me (in fact the error is
apparently benign), and I'm afraid I don't know
when it happens, the exception just shows up on UNIX stdout which
I don't see until I iconify the workspace.  It shows up most
times if I'm doing a reasonable amount of programming.  I wasn't 
starting any Java applications.

Closing as WORKSFORME.
Please reopen if you get it again.
